title: Paris-Roubaix Water-Bottle Tosser Breaks Silence: ‘How Could I Be So Stupid?’
content:
Fan who struck Van der Poel with water bottle during Paris-Roubaix begs forgiveness: 'I'm glad he didn't crash. I've been really ashamed.'

Read the full article at Paris-Roubaix Water-Bottle Tosser Breaks Silence: ‘How Could I Be So Stupid?’ on Velo.
author: ahood
